categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Lundi was a Cargo ferry employed by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

When Airam Clan leader Tamaron agreed to replenish the Rebel's Warhead supply he arranged the transfer to take place at The Drift. Lundi along with sister ship Orrian and MC40a light cruiser Condor arrived to pick up the warheads. However as this was going on T-wings from rival Airam clan leader and Imperial collaborator Ilay would arrive to attack the Asteroid Base Attila. X-wings from both Rogue and Gold Squadron fought of the T-wings and afterwards Assault Gunboats and an Imperial-class Star Destroyer Wasp long enough for the transfer to be completed and both Rebel and Airam ships to jump to Hyperspace.
